text: vai dEqvA ujji#tiq-manUda#jayan dar.SapUrNamAqsAByAq-masu#rAqnapA#-nudantAqgnE-raqhamujji#tiq-manUjjE#Shaq-mityA#ha dar.SapUrNamAqsayO#rEqva dEqvatA#nAqM ~Myaja#mAnaq ujji#tiqmanUjja#yati dar.SapUrNamAqsAByAqM BrAtRu#vyAqnapa# nudatEq vAja#vatIByAqM ~MvyU#haqtyannaqM ~Mvai vAjO&nna#mEqvAva# rundhEq dvAByAqM prati#ShThityaiqyO vai yaqj~jasyaq dvau dOhau# viqdvAn. yaja#ta uBaqyata# - [  ] 16
